question: Who of the following releases the consolidated FDI policy?
option1: The Department of Industrial Policy & Promotion (DIPP)
option4: Department of Tax and Excise Duty
answer: The Department of Industrial Policy & Promotion (DIPP)
explanation: The Department of Industrial Policy & Promotion (DIPP) released the consolidated Foreign Direct Investment (FDI) Policy on Monday subsuming all the changes in rules and procedures notified by the government over the past year. The document included the startups can raise up to 100% of funds from foreign Venture Capital Investors(FVCI).
